article:
The following is a sortable 'list of living [[Cardinal
(Catholicism)|cardinals]]' in the Catholic Church. For example, to see the
cardinals listed alphabetically by country, click on the box at the top of the
"Country" column. Cardinals aged over 80 years on the day the Papacy falls
vacant cannot participate in the Papal conclave, so (for example) those born
before -80}} could not participate if the Papacy fell vacant today.

As of }}:

* there are 203 living cardinals of which 112 would be eligible to vote if the
  papacy fell vacant today
* Godfried Danneels was the last cardinal to turn 80 on 4 June 2013
* Francisco Javier ErrÃ¡zuriz Ossa will be the next cardinal to turn 80 on 5
  September 2013
* Ersilio Tonini was the last cardinal to die on 28 July 2013
* the last new cardinals were appointed on 24 November 2012
categories: Roman Catholic cardinals|*List of living cardinals
